entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnableAotAnalyzer=true should also default EnableSingleFileAnalyzer=true #31284
  • Improve workload list to work better with VS and other SDK bands #31283
    8.0.1xx
  • Improve workload repair to actually fix a customers installation and manifests #31282
    8.0.1xx
  • .NET developers have an improved containerization experience #31281
    8.0.1xx
  • Blazor wasm client fails to start when PublishTrimmed=true and built using 7.0.201 and above #31269

Closed

  • SDK acquisition improvements #23356
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31286
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Experimental] Check if Helix queue works for tests #31272
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31262
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adjust artifacts location to adapt tests running locally and on Helix #31276
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Emit AssemblyVersion and ReferenceAssembly assembly attributes #31275
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Move RDG omission to ResolveTargetingPackAssets target #31265
    Area-AspNetCore
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • Files not ending in css are probably not css files #23086
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
  • [draft] moving dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31181
  • Blazor configuration for StartupMemoryCache and Jiterpreter #31174
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [WIP] Add unit test for the TypeForwardedTo assembly attributes. #31252
    Area-GenAPI
  • [Experimental] Fix test failures caused by adjusting path of artifacts and the target framework of templates in built SDK #31239
    Area-Infrastructure
